SEARCH
Package com.fortisbank.contracts.utils

Class ValidationUtils

java.lang.Object
com.fortisbank.contracts.utils.ValidationUtils
public class ValidationUtils extends Object
Utility class for centralized validation logic used across the application, and for Swing field input filtering and live validation feedback.

    • attachRealTimeValidation

      public static void attachRealTimeValidation(JTextField field, JLabel statusLabel, Predicate<String> validator, String successText, String errorText)
      Attaches real-time validation to the given JTextField.
      Parameters:
      field - the JTextField to validate
      statusLabel - the JLabel to display validation status
      validator - the validation function
      successText - the text to display on successful validation
      errorText - the text to display on validation failure
